p: V. arborea essential oil is rich in α-bisabolol and may be an alternative for the the management of C. maculatus and other insect-pests in stored products. This oil has a fumigating insecticidal effect on adults reducing female oviposition, population growth rate, and development of this insect. The pure major constituent of V. arborea essential oil, the α-Bisabolol, caused higher mortality of C. maculatus males than V. arborea essential oil with a mortality proportional to the concentration increase.
